text: So I’m attempting to use the new blog listing editing feature from here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Releases-and-Updates/Drag-and-Drop-Blog-Listing-Page-Editing/ba-p/498923> and it ays that if the template has dnd_areas then the user can add modules etc. But when I try and add a dnd_area to my blog template I get the Error:The template cannot contain “dnd_area” modules.  Am I missing something?

If im not mistaken this page should be a normal page type and not a blog type. Which would likely be why youre getting that error. Even though this is technically a blog listing page it should be treated as a normal page that has access to the “content” object like a normal blog page.
If I change it to a regular page and not a blog then I don’t think it’ll show up to be selected for my blog template in settings if I’m not mistaken.
